Text:
Width                            : 720 pixels
Height                           : 404 pixels
HDTV's 720p stands for height resolution not width
720p is 1280x720

@Nozomu
dude, i know that, the "HDTV" tag was already in the name when i ReEncoded it, and it indicates the source not the final dimensions .. that's why the media info was posted. thanks for the comment though :)
